40  void KSIntSpinFlip::CalculateTransitionRate( const KSParticle& aParticle, double& aTransitionRate )
41  {
42  KThreeVector GradBMagnitude = aParticle.GetMagneticGradient() * aParticle.GetMagneticField() / aParticle.GetMagneticField().Magnitude();
43  KThreeMatrix GradBDirection = aParticle.GetMagneticGradient() / aParticle.GetMagneticField().Magnitude() - KThreeMatrix::OuterProduct( aParticle.GetMagneticField(), GradBMagnitude ) / aParticle.GetMagneticField().Magnitude() / aParticle.GetMagneticField().Magnitude();
44  KThreeVector BDirectionDot = aParticle.GetVelocity() * GradBDirection;
45 
46  double CycleFlipProbability = 1 / aParticle.GetGyromagneticRatio() / aParticle.GetGyromagneticRatio() / aParticle.GetMagneticField().MagnitudeSquared()
47  * BDirectionDot.MagnitudeSquared()
48  * sin( KConst::Pi() * ( 1 - aParticle.GetAlignedSpin() ) ) * sin( KConst::Pi() * ( 1 - aParticle.GetAlignedSpin() ) );
49 
50  aTransitionRate = std::fabs( CycleFlipProbability * aParticle.GetGyromagneticRatio() * aParticle.GetMagneticField().Magnitude() / 2 / KConst::Pi() );
51 
52  //std::cout << "GradBMagnitude: " << GradBMagnitude << "\tGradBDirection: " << GradBDirection << "\nBDiretionDot: " << BDirectionDot << "\tCycleFlipProbability: " << CycleFlipProbability << "\n";
53  //std::cout << "TransitionRate: " << aTransitionRate << "\n";
54  //std::cout << "CALC RATE\n";
55  }
56 
57  void KSIntSpinFlip::CalculateInteraction(
58  const KSTrajectory& aTrajectory,
59  const KSParticle& aTrajectoryInitialParticle,
60  const KSParticle& aTrajectoryFinalParticle,
61  const KThreeVector& /*aTrajectoryCenter*/,
62  const double& /*aTrajectoryRadius*/,
63  const double& aTrajectoryTimeStep,
64  KSParticle& anInteractionParticle,
65  double& aTimeStep,
66  bool& aFlag
67  )
68  {
69  double TransitionRate = 0.0;
70  CalculateTransitionRate( aTrajectoryInitialParticle, TransitionRate );
71  double tProbability = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 1. );
72  double FlipTime = -1. * log( 1. - tProbability ) / TransitionRate;
73  //std::cout << "Flip Time: " << FlipTime << "\tTrajectoryTimeStep: " << aTrajectoryTimeStep << "\n";
74  if ( std::isnan( FlipTime ) )
75  {
76  FlipTime = numeric_limits< double >::max();
77  //std::cout << "nan\n";
78  }
79 
80  if( FlipTime > aTrajectoryTimeStep )
81  {
82  anInteractionParticle = aTrajectoryFinalParticle;
83  aTimeStep = aTrajectoryTimeStep;
84  aFlag = false;
85  //std::cout << "shouldn't flip\tTimeStep: " << aTimeStep << "\n";
86  }
87  else
88  {
89  anInteractionParticle = aTrajectoryInitialParticle;
90  aTrajectory.ExecuteTrajectory( FlipTime, anInteractionParticle );
91  aTimeStep = FlipTime;
92  aFlag = true;
93  //std::cout << "should flip\tTimeStep: " << aTimeStep << "\n";
94  }
95 
96  //std::cout << "CALC INT\n";
97  }
98 
99  void KSIntSpinFlip::ExecuteInteraction( const KSParticle& anInteractionParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& /*aSecondaries*/ ) const
100  {
101  aFinalParticle = anInteractionParticle;
102  aFinalParticle.SetAlignedSpin( -1 * aFinalParticle.GetAlignedSpin() );
103  aFinalParticle.SetSpinAngle( aFinalParticle.GetSpinAngle() + KConst::Pi() );
104 
105  //std::cout << "Time: " << aFinalParticle.GetTime() << "\tPosition: " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition() << "\n";
106  //std::cout << "FLIP\n";
107  }
108 
109 }
